alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:57PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz County through 530 PM MST... At 456 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southwest of Gladden, or 30 miles south of Alamo Lake, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wenden, Salome and Harcuvar. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 51 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
